name: Hades3310
description:
Warning: Sorry, HTML version is kinda slow. I will be able to upload a PC version after voting is done. 

There is no escape from Hell! Or is it? 

You're a son of a greek god Hades, wanting to escape the Land of the Dead and reach Olympus. 

A rogue-like game (or rogue-lite maybe). After you die, you start over again , but you keep all your money and all permanent upgrades that were bought in the shop. 

Disclaimer: 

This project is a non-commercial fan game, based on the game "Hades" by Supergiant Games.

Controls:

WASD or arrows to move

Crtl or Left Click to select or attack
